definitions.body: press, hasten (trans. but obj. not expr.) Ex 5:13 (E ).
(intr.) be pressed, confined, narrow Jos 17:15 [[כִי אָץ לְךָ הַר־אֶפְרַיִם]].

hasten, make haste, sq. [[ל]] + Inf. Jos 10:13 [[לאׁ אָץ לָבוֹא]] (J, of sun); Pr 28:20 [[לְהַעֲשִׂיר]] ´[[א]]; sq. [[מִן]] Je 17:16 [[מֵרׂעֶה]] ´[[לאׁ א]]; sq. [[ב]] (of particular in wh. one hastens) Pr 19:2 ([[בְּרגְלַיִם]]); Pr 29:20 ([[בִּדְבָרִים]]); cf. also Pr 21:5 [[וְכָל־אָץ אַח לְמַחְסוֹר]].
